prompt: I'm receiving lot's of notifications about all kinds of pages I'm not interested in. These seem to have been enabled automatically. How can I disable these notifications?
expected_answer: By default, a page where you have made a major modification is automatically added to the list of pages you watch. It means you will be notified about changes on your work. You can change the setting for "Automatic page watching" in the notification settings in your user profile. You can delete existing notification filters that were created this way in the "Custom Filters" list in the notification settings in your user profile.

https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ 


Based on the search results, it appears you are using the XWiki platform and are experiencing issues with receiving unwanted notifications. Here’s how you can manage and disable these notifications:

1. **Access Notification Settings:**
   - Go to the notifications menu and click on the link to go to the "settings" of the notifications.
   ![notif4.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif4.png?rev=1.8)

2. **Select Notification Types:**
   - By default, users only get notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. For receiving other notifications, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. You can enable or disable all notification types that belong to a particular application by clicking on the bells.
   ![NotificationsTogglesDisabled.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationsTogglesDisabled.png?rev=1.3)

3. **Auto Watch Settings:**
   - By default, a page where you have made a major modification is automatically added to the list of pages you watch. This means you will be notified about changes on your work. You can change this behavior in the settings.
   ![AutoWatch.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/AutoWatch.png?rev=1.3)

4. **Custom Filters:**
   - You can create custom filters to manage notifications more precisely. These filters can be enabled, disabled, or deleted. Note that these filters are dedicated to filtering events on specific locations.
   ![notifications-filters-settings.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notifications-filters-settings.png?rev=1.4)

5. **Follow/Unfollow Users:**
   - If you are receiving notifications about activities from specific users, you can manage this by following or unfollowing users from their profile page.

For more detailed instructions, you can refer to the [XWiki Notifications Application documentation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/).

If you need further assistance or if these steps do not resolve your issue, please let me know!
